commands.precommit: npm run lint -- --fix npm run build
commands.tools:
npm run dev Starts the development server
npm run preview Previews the production build locally
npm install $NEW_DEPENDENCY Installs a new production dependency
npm install --save-dev $NEW_DEV_DEPENDENCY Installs a new development dependency
npx vite create $NEW_COMPONENT_NAME Creates a new component using Vite's scaffolding
npx tsc --noEmit Runs TypeScript compiler to check for type errors without emitting files
npx eslint $FILE_OR_DIRECTORY Runs ESLint on a specific file or directory
npx vite optimize Pre-bundles dependencies to improve startup time
